name: Cubo Sfera
description:
Made in Unity during 36 hours for IZTECH HyperJam 22, 2022.

Your goal is to go as deep as you can while trying to pick the right shapes.

Theme: Puzzle-Runner

[Controls]

use Mouse to move around

use LMB to change shape

[Team CloudWire]

Cem Kaan Uğur : Designer - Developer

Ege Canıbek : Developer

~ Free Assets ~
